attributes.action: Ensure that convicted criminals with financial means should contribute to the cost of their incarceration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the midst of global recession, with the possibility of reduced spending in the coming years, it seems to me obscene that there are convicted criminals costing the state by some estimates £70K per annum, who have the means to make either a part or full contribution to the cost of their incarceration.
